chunk:
Furtuna Skin Rinascita Delle Olive Replenishing Balm

Brand: Furtuna Skin

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment
book: 0560-Furtuna Skin Rinascita Delle Olive Replenishing Balm

chunk: Ingredients: Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil**, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil**, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Garcinia Indica (Kokum) Seed Butter**, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil**, Michelia Alba (Magnolia) Leaf Oil**, Picris Echioides (Bristly Oxtongue) Leaf Extract*, Crataegus Monogyna (Hawthorn) Flower Extract*, Calamintha Nepeta
book: 0560-Furtuna Skin Rinascita Delle Olive Replenishing Balm

chunk: Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil**, Michelia Alba (Magnolia) Leaf Oil**, Picris Echioides (Bristly Oxtongue) Leaf Extract*, Crataegus Monogyna (Hawthorn) Flower Extract*, Calamintha Nepeta (Calamint) Leaf Extract*, Daucus Carota (Carrot) Root Extract*, Taraxacum Officinale (Dandelion) Leaf Extract*, Taraxacum Officinale (Dandelion) Flower
book: 0560-Furtuna Skin Rinascita Delle Olive Replenishing Balm

chunk: (Hawthorn) Flower Extract*, Calamintha Nepeta (Calamint) Leaf Extract*, Daucus Carota (Carrot) Root Extract*, Taraxacum Officinale (Dandelion) Leaf Extract*, Taraxacum Officinale (Dandelion) Flower Extract*, Hypericum Perforatum (St. John s Wort) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract**, Tocopherol, Spirulina Platensis Powder
book: 0560-Furtuna Skin Rinascita Delle Olive Replenishing Balm

chunk: Directions: Melt a tiny dot into skin, concentrating on sensitive areas. Layer over moisturizer as the last product in your morning or evening ritual. Add layer upon layer of balm until skin is satisfied.
book: 0560-Furtuna Skin Rinascita Delle Olive Replenishing Balm
